channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2024051252
item.description:
Report X-2024051252

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-06T15:13:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-02
  • City: FCA
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During the TSA screening process there was several electronic devices that were discovered. Agent called the shipper asking him to disclose what was actually in the shipment and he consented to the search of the shipment. When agent went through the shipment they discovered several battery charging packs, a drone with several detached lithium-ion batteries. He stated that he was unaware of the items and his wife packed the shipment for him.
